idea:
Sehat provides a complete solution to bring lifestyle changes for women of tier 2&3  cities, suffering from the most prevalent diseases in all age groups, majorly: PCOD, Menstrual problems, and Auto-immune diseases to decrease the dependency and long-term side-effects of continuous and expensive medication.


The platform serves :

  1. Personal health coach on a paid and freemium basis.

  2. Community to share their personal experience of going through the disease and sharing insights on what has helped them to recover/decrease the impact of it.

  3. Shopping Cart to buy medicines on subscriptions, quarterly check-ups, and natural supplements to boost health.

  4. Access to affordable and quality physicians.


The vision here is to create awareness of the diseases in tier 2/3 cities, to detect early and better manage them to avoid expensive treatments afterward, by collaborating with schools, colleges, SHGâ€™s and corporates.
name: Sehat

idea: The concept is to deliver the diesel to doorstep to the required industries. Till date we are following the traditional process i.e., one has to go to fuel station and bring the diesel from the diesel station and store it in a container. So, it includes many losses. So we are coming up with the new technology that is delivery of diesel to your door step. In this we are having our highly safe diesel delivery tankers (Bowsers) which bring the diesel to your place by using a simple mobile application. This we will help to stop the loss which occurs due to old traditional method of fuel procurement.
name: SUMIYE PETROCHEM FUELLING LLP

idea: Chrysaellect M.E.E.T is India's premier up-skilling platform for teachers, educators, parents and edupreneurs, who wish to hone their skills and understanding about concepts, theories and pedagogies related to Early Childhood Education.
